rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0001
rows.name:
A Knight of Iira, eh? That's a
really big deal. Congratulations!

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, I'm sorry, I bet there's some new
fancy way I'm supposed to address you
now. Don't know if I can get used to it...

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0003
rows.name:
You're really going up in the world,
aren't you? Such a big change... I can
hardly believe it's the same you!

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I see loads of knights up
at the palace. Real dignified
old gents, they are.

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Things must be really
hotting up if they need
people so young to join up.

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Hey, I also heard that Adel's going to
be taking on some really huge stuff
soon. Even so, don't be a stranger!

rows.label: tlk70000010_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I want you to know that
I believe in you.
